name: Bluetooth On/Off Widget
description: The widget is designed to enable/disable Bluetooth adapter, quick access to settings and list of available devices.  Implemented:  option turn off the Bluetooth adapter when device is reboot;  option switch types: one button or three (with buttons settings);  ability to change the border color of the widget (for Android 2.2 and above);  start scan for Bluetooth devices;  ability to change the horizontal and vertical size (for Android 3.1 and above);  option Make discoverable for other Bluetooth devices (button More...).  Permission Location (network-based) is used to discovering available Bluetooth-devices (for Android 6.0 and above). You must enable location on the device.
